categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Silkenfrond was a plant which was used as a material in clothes made in the Arkadianate during the Republic Dark Age. Large quantities of silkenfrond were grown in hydroponic plants in the capital city of Calimondretta on the icy planet of Syned. They were then processed into a thread at textile mills. Garments made from silkenfrond had a reputation of being warm and colorful, which resonated with the Sith Lord Arkadia Calimondra's philosophy of exploiting everyone's full potential.
